    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Attraction and repulsion of magnets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anziehung und Abstossung der Magneten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attraction et répulsion des aimants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atração e repulsion dos ímãs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrazione e repulsione dei magneti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έλξη και απέχθεια των μαγνητών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Atracción y repulsión de imanes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These figures show how two magnets attract (top) and repel (bottom) each other.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">equal force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic poles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">opposite force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pairs of forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen, wie zwei Magneten 
anziehen (Oberseite) und stoßen (Unterseite) ab.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces figures montrent comment deux aimants 
attirent (dessus) et repoussent (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas figuras mostram como dois ímãs atraem 
(alto) e repelem (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste figure mostrano come due magneti si 
attraggono (parte superiore) e respingono (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτοί οι αριθμοί επιδεικνύουν πώς δύο μαγνήτες 
προσελκύουν (κορυφή) και αποκρούουν (κατώτατο σημείο) ο ένας τον
άλλον.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas figuras muestran cómo dos imanes atraen 
(tapa) y rechazan (fondo).</string>
          </description>
